name: She's Out of My Life
wikiSummary: "She's Out Of My Life" is a song off of Michael Jackson's 1979 album 'Off The Wall'. It was the fourth single released off the album, and peaked at #10 on the Billboard Hot 100.  A crucial moment in the song occurs near its end when Jackson begins to break down in tears as he sings the word "life". Jackson tried many takes of the last few minutes of the song, but always ended the same way – breaking down in tears. Eventually Quincy Jones decided to leave it in the recording.
wikiText:
"She's Out Of My Life" is a song off of Michael Jackson's 1979 album 'Off The Wall'. It was the fourth single released off the album, and peaked at #10 on the Billboard Hot 100.
 
 A crucial moment in the song occurs near its end when Jackson begins to break down in tears as he sings the word "life". Jackson tried many takes of the last few minutes of the song, but always ended the same way – breaking down in tears. Eventually Quincy Jones decided to leave it in the recording.
